Operation 'get_/' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is misleading - it doesn't clarify that this retrieves colors matching a query, not all colors. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (hex values) and what distance calculations represent. Added specificity about hex input, matching behavior, and use case for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Get all colors of the default color name list
data.current_description: Returns an array of colors from the specified list, with distance calculations to show how close each match is to the requested colors. When providing multiple values, the endpoint will find the closest match for each color.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve color names with distance calculations
data.description_suggestion: Returns an array of color objects from the default color name list with distance calculations showing how closely each color matches the requested hex value(s). Accepts one or more hex color values as input and returns the closest matching color name(s) from the list along with their distance metrics. Useful for finding the nearest named color to any given hex value.
data.reasoning: Original summary is misleading - it doesn't clarify that this retrieves colors matching a query, not all colors. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (hex values) and what distance calculations represent. Added specificity about hex input, matching behavior, and use case for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_/names/' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is vague and description is completely missing. Added clarity about what 'all colors' means, what data is returned in each color object, and clarified this is the unfiltered default list. Specified no input parameters required for AI agent to understand this is a simple retrieval operation.

data.current_summary: Get all colors of the default color name list
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all named colors from default list
data.description_suggestion: Returns a complete array of all color objects available in the default color name list. Each color object includes the hex value, color name, and additional metadata. This endpoint provides the full reference set of named colors without filtering or distance calculations. No input parameters required.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague and description is completely missing. Added clarity about what 'all colors' means, what data is returned in each color object, and clarified this is the unfiltered default list. Specified no input parameters required for AI agent to understand this is a simple retrieval operation.

message: Operation 'get_/lists/' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary incorrectly states 'default color name list' when this operation returns metadata about all available lists. Description is incomplete - doesn't clarify what metadata is included or that this is a discovery endpoint. Improved summary to reflect list enumeration and enhanced description with specifics about returned fields and use case.

data.current_summary: Get all colors of the default color name list
data.current_description: Returns a list of available color name lists with descriptions and URLs to the color list endpoints.
data.summary_suggestion: List all available color name lists
data.description_suggestion: Returns metadata for all available color name lists including their names, descriptions, and endpoint URLs. This operation allows discovery of alternative color naming systems beyond the default list. Each list entry includes the list identifier, human-readable description, and the URL to access that specific color list. No input parameters required.
data.reasoning: Summary incorrectly states 'default color name list' when this operation returns metadata about all available lists. Description is incomplete - doesn't clarify what metadata is included or that this is a discovery endpoint. Improved summary to reflect list enumeration and enhanced description with specifics about returned fields and use case.

message: Operation 'get_/swatch/' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is clear and actionable. Description lacks specificity about required input (hex value) and optional input (color name), and doesn't clarify the output format (SVG) or use cases. Enhanced description to specify input parameters, output format, and practical applications for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Generate a color swatch for any color
data.current_description: Generates an SVG swatch representation of a color. The swatch can include the color name if provided. The SVG is designed to be visually appealing and readable across different backgrounds.
data.description_suggestion: Generates an SVG swatch representation for a specified color. Accepts a hex color value as input and optionally a color name to display on the swatch. Returns an SVG image designed for visual appeal and readability across different backgrounds. The swatch can be embedded directly in web pages or used as a visual reference for the color.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description lacks specificity about required input (hex value) and optional input (color name), and doesn't clarify the output format (SVG) or use cases. Enhanced description to specify input parameters, output format, and practical applications for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Get all colors of the default color name list
